text:
ce="preserve">These are tables of congressional delegations from Kansas to the United States Senate and United States House of Representatives.
Living former Members of the U.S. House of Representatives from Kansas.
, there are seventeen former members of the U.S. House of Representatives from the U.S. State of Kansas who are currently living at this time.
Living former U.S. Senators from Kansas.
, there are four former U.S. Senators from the U.S. State of Kansas who are currently living at this time, one from Class 2 and three from Class 3.
